CHAPTER 1026 Trees and Shrubs

1026.01 Physical obstruction of sidewalks and streets. 1026.02 Visual obstruction of sidewalks and streets. 1026.03 Planting trees in tree lawns. 1026.04 Trimming and removing dead or damaged vegetation. 1026.05 Notice to correct. 1026.06 Failure to cure. 1026.07 Costs. 1026.99 Penalty.
